tagline: Your one-stop solution for comfortable stays and professional event spaces.
languagesSupported: Available in English, Oromo, and Amharic.
powerfulManagement: Comprehensive tools for managing bookings and facilities.
viewAndManageDormitories: View and manage all registered dormitories.
searchDormitories: Search by room number or floor...

name: Name

companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book our facilities.

viewOrPrintDormitoryBookingData: View or print detailed dormitory booking data for specific periods.
noDataForReport: No data available for the selected report and period.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: Agreement generation is not applicable for this booking's category or status.
errorFetchingBookingDetails: There was an error fetching booking details.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter custom terms here. These will override the default terms if provided.
editTermsNote: Leave blank to use default terms. Changes here only affect this specific agreement.
noBookingIdProvided: No booking ID was provided in the URL.
providerAddressPlaceholder: Kebele 01, Oromia Special Zone, Addis Ababa
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Full payment must be made prior to the service start date unless otherwise agreed in writing.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the start date are subject to a 50% cancellation fee. Cancellations made less than 48 hours prior are non-refundable.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. The client is responsible for any damage to the facilities or equipment caused by their attendees.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. The Service Provider is not responsible for loss or damage to personal property of the client or attendees.
agreementNotApplicable: Agreement is not applicable for this type of booking.
yourActiveBookingsDescription: View and manage your company's active facility bookings.
noActiveBookingsFound: You have no active facility bookings.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyDashboard: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this page.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
accountPendingApprovalMultiBook: Your company account is still pending approval. You will be able to book facilities once approved.
agreementUploadedSuccessfully: Your signed agreement has been uploaded successfully. An admin will review it shortly.
errorUploadingAgreementActual: There was an error uploading your signed agreement. Please try again or contact support.
failedToUploadToCloudinary: Failed to upload file to storage. Please ensure the file is a valid PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, or PNG and try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing or does not apply to this booking.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: You do not have permission to view this agreement.

myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your active dormitory booking.
enterPhoneNumberPrompt: Enter your phone number used for booking
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter your phone number to search.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings. Please try again.
noActiveBookingsFoundForPhone: No active, approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a start and end date for the report first.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to complete your payment.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: For dormitory bookings, after payment, send your payment proof (screenshot/receipt), Booking ID ({bookingId}), and the phone number used for booking via Telegram to @OROTRAIN. For facility bookings, admin will contact you.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the payment for a dormitory, please send your payment proof (e.g., screenshot, bank receipt), your Booking ID, and your phone number ({phoneNumber}) via Telegram to our bot: {botUsername}. This is required for verification.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending proof, an admin will verify your payment and approve your booking.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing from the request.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not expected for this booking or has already been processed.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Booking confirmation details are incomplete. Please try booking again or contact support.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you! Your request has been received and will be reviewed by our admin team shortly. We will contact you regarding payment and the agreement.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your request is pending. Please complete payment as per the instructions below and send proof via Telegram to @OROTRAIN for verification.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. Please check details below.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your booking request is submitted. Please make the payment and send proof via Telegram to @OROTRAIN including your Booking ID and phone number.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: Ensure to include your Booking ID ({bookingId}) and phone number when sending payment proof via Telegram.
itemNotFound: The requested item could not be found.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: Error fetching dormitory details. Please try again.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: Room {roomNumber} is currently not available for booking as per admin settings.
addLedProjectorDescription: Include an LED projector with your section booking (additional cost applies).

noFacilitiesAvailableInDateRange: No halls or sections are available for the selected date range and type.
noItemsCurrentlyMatchFilters: No items match the current filters or date range.
loginToBookMultipleDesc: Please log in as an approved company representative to select and book multiple facilities.
selectDateRangeFirstTooltip: Please select a date range first to enable booking.

pleaseSelectDateRangeToEnableBooking: Select a date range to enable booking.
accountPendingApprovalBookFacility: Your company account is pending approval. You can book facilities once approved.
loginAsCompanyToBook: Please log in as an approved company representative to book.
pleaseSelectItemsToBook: Please select one or more items to book.
fillFormToBookSelectedItems: Review and confirm details for the selected facilities.
fillFormToBookFacility: Fill in the form to request a booking for the selected facility.
itemNotAvailableErrorMultiBook: Item '{itemName}' is currently not available for booking. It has been removed from your selection.
itemNotFoundDatabase: Item '{itemName}' was not found in our records. It has been removed from your selection.
errorFetchingItemDetailsMulti: Error fetching details for '{itemName}'. It has been removed from your selection.
noItemsSelectedForBooking: No items were selected for booking.
noValidItemsForBooking: No valid items could be loaded for booking. Please try selecting again.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: Your phone number (optional, for easier communication if needed)
anySpecialRequests: Any special requests or additional information...
dateRangeRequired: Date range with start and end dates is required.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be before start date.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate the total price. Item price might be missing.
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your request has been submitted and is pending admin approval.
errorSubmittingBooking: Error submitting your booking request. Please try again.
errorCalculatingTotalCostNaN: An error occurred while calculating the total cost. Please review your selections.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: Facility '{itemName}' is currently marked as unavailable by admin.
itemUnavailableConflict: Sorry, '{itemName}' is already booked or pending for some or all of the selected dates.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: Capacity for the selected dormitory is not configured. Booking cannot proceed.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: Sorry, '{roomName}' does not have enough available beds for the selected dates.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book a dormitory room more than once for the same start day with the same phone number. If you need to make changes, please contact us.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: A system check for duplicate bookings was skipped due to a missing database index. Your booking will proceed. Please contact support if you suspect a double booking.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (Firestore index) is required to prevent duplicate bookings. Please contact support. Your booking cannot be processed at this time.
adminNoBuildingAssignmentDormView: Your admin account is not assigned to a specific building. Please contact a superadmin.
adminNoBuildingAssignmentDormBookings: Your admin account is not assigned to a specific building, so no dormitory bookings can be displayed.
